author: twerske
message:
fix(devtools): change colors (rangle/angular-devtools#453)

* change colors - full accessibility on contrast WCAG AAA

* small font size fix

Co-authored-by: Emma Twersky <emmatwersky@google.com>

files.patch: @@ -1,4 +1,4 @@ - + @@ -19,12 +19,18 @@ - + Enable timing API

@@ -1 +1 @@
-<mat-toolbar color="primary">Properties of {{ directive }} </mat-toolbar>
+<mat-toolbar color="accent">Properties of {{ directive }} </mat-toolbar>
